kubernetes_endpoints.description: An Endpoints resource is an abstraction, linked to a Service, which defines the list of endpoints that actually implement the service.

metadata.description: Standard endpoints' metadata. For more info see [Kubernetes reference](https://github.com/kubernetes/community/blob/master/contributors/devel/sig-architecture/api-conventions.md#metadata)

subset.description: Set of addresses and ports that comprise a service. Can be repeated multiple times.
